artist: Artist: Harry Furniss; Author: Lewis Carroll; Printer: Richard Clay and Sons, Ltd., London; Publisher: Macmillan and Co., London
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: full red leather, blind and gold-stamped; raised spine (this volume has been rebound, original spine and sides in back: full red buckram, gold-stamped); endpapers: green wove (originally probably white wove); gilt-edged, red silk bookmark attached; 454 pp.
provenance: Dorothy Millett Lindeke, Wayzata, Minn.; given to MIA, 1987.
title: Sylvie and Bruno
